review: It's simple to hook up and works perfectly
author: sidney bayless

review: It seems like the fire stick has great potential.  Its functionality is great.  IMO Amazon Prime seems to be lacking content.  The majority of the movies are B-Movies or they are there for purchase.  More titles = Better Prime Experience
author: God n' Me

review: I like the Fire TV Stick just fine. The only problem that I'm having is that I cannot Launch Plex.tv. Maube you can point me to someone who can help.
author: Julio Pinilla

review: Great little toy.  I am not technically inclined and this was so easy for me hook.
author: Annie T.

review: This is an awesome item. My husband took over the remote.  Thanks Amazon for providing such a wonderful value and great viewing experience.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Great product! Lots of content, a must have for prime users
author: Christian Mengers

review: Excellent.  Works as advertised and easy to set up.
author: James E. Greer

review: Unfortunately doesnt work well when u have satellite internet speed. Very very very slow in downloading. Not the product!! Excellent product. Reason for three star rating is downloadable capabilities with satellite internet wireless connection.
author: stu
